i do have some.......what i'm trying to say, is if i didn't do it all at
once, i would have made you mad anyway because my characters would have
eventually found their way there no matter how damaged they would have
been......and RGDan has moded me alot, and no matter how much i tell him
that i don't acept it, he keeps repeeating it again and again.....i would
have gave him the boot a LOOOONG time ago......anyway, i told you i was
going to do that a few days ago....please let's just drop it..i did what you
call illegal, suposedly, and that's that...let's just continue the RPG like
normal.......if that's fine with you......
